mapper.sql: id ,name ,teacher_id as teacherId ,address_id as addressId ,org_id as orgId ,begin_time as beginTime ,end_time as endTime ,arrange_id as arrangeId updated_time as updatedTime, created_time as createdTime
mapper.select: select c.id ,c.name ,c.teacher_id as teacherId ,c.address_id as addressId ,c.org_id as orgId ,c.begin_time as beginTime ,c.end_time as endTime ,c.arrange_id as arrangeId c.updated_time as updatedTime, c.created_time as createdTime org.name from class c left join org o on c.org_id = org.id where name like '${param}' or org_name like '${param}'
